improved-signs.midnightconfig.enableFram:
When clicking an item frame hanging on an inventory block, the click passes through the item frame and interacts with the inventory. 
Use shift-click to force interacting with the item frame
improved-signs.midnightconfig.enableSign: Click the source sign with a stack of signs in hand to copy the text on the clicked side.

When clicking a sign hanging on an inventory block, the click passes through the sign and interacts with the inventory. 
Use shift-click to force interacting with the sign
When breaking a sign, the item will retain the text and dyed colors.
improved-signs.midnightconfig.invisibleF: Item Used to Make Item Frames Invisible
improved-signs.midnightconfig.retainDyeO:
This option will copy the target sign's color and glow. 
Disabled by default because it's technically duping dyes.
improved-signs.midnightconfig.title: Improved Signs Configuration
